verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> The words נְחֶמְיָ֖ה <S%H5166><s%> of Nehemiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֲכַלְיָ֑ה <S%H2446><s%> of Hachaliah וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> happened בְחֹֽדֶשׁ־ <S%H2320><s%> And it came to pass in the month [כִּסְלֵו כ] (כִּסְלֵיו֙ <S%H3691><s%> Chisleu ק) שְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year עֶשְׂרִ֔ים <S%H6242><s%> in the twentieth וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <S%H7800><s%> as I was in Shushan הַבִּירָֽה׃ <S%H1002><s%> the palace

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came חֲנָ֜נִי <S%H2607><s%> That Hanani אֶחָ֧ד <S%H259><s%> one מֵאַחַ֛י <S%H251><s%> of my brethren ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and some וַאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> men מִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וָאֶשְׁאָלֵ֞ם <S%H7592><s%> and I asked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַיְּהוּדִ֧ים <S%H3064><s%> them concerning the Jews הַפְּלֵיטָ֛ה <S%H6413><s%> that had escaped אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and נִשְׁאֲר֥וּ <S%H7604><s%> which were left מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשֶּׁ֖בִי <S%H7628><s%> of the captivity וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and about יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and concerning Jerusalem

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> And they said לִי֒ הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִ֞ים <S%H7604><s%> unto me The remnant אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִשְׁאֲר֤וּ <S%H7604><s%> that are left מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַשְּׁבִי֙ <S%H7628><s%> of the captivity שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there בַּמְּדִינָ֔ה <S%H4082><s%> there in the province בְּרָעָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> affliction גְדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> [are] in great וּבְחֶרְפָּ֑ה <S%H2781><s%> and reproach וְחוֹמַ֤ת <S%H2346><s%> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem מְפֹרָ֔צֶת <S%H6555><s%> also [is] broken down וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H8179><s%> and the gates נִצְּת֥וּ <S%H3341><s%> thereof are burned בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> with fire

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּשָׁמְעִ֣י ׀ <S%H8085><s%> And it came to pass when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H3427><s%> that I sat down וָֽאֶבְכֶּ֔ה <S%H1058><s%> and wept וָאֶתְאַבְּלָ֖ה <S%H56><s%> and mourned יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> [certain] days וָֽאֱהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become צָם֙ <S%H6684><s%> and fasted וּמִתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <S%H6419><s%> and prayed לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven

וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> And said אָֽנָּ֤א <S%H577><s%> I beseech יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven הָאֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> the great וְהַנּוֹרָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> and terrible שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> that keepeth הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> covenant וָחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֖יו <S%H157><s%> for them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> him and observe מִצְוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4687><s%> his commandments

תְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now אָזְנְךָֽ־ <S%H241><s%> Let thine ear קַשֶּׁ֣בֶת <S%H7183><s%> now be attentive וְֽעֵינֶ֪יךָ <S%H5869><s%> and thine eyes פְתֻוּח֟וֹת <S%H6605><s%> open לִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> that thou mayest hear אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תְּפִלַּ֣ת <S%H8605><s%> the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֡ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִי֩ <S%H595><s%> I מִתְפַּלֵּ֨ל <S%H6419><s%> which I pray לְפָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> thee now יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servants וּמִתְוַדֶּ֗ה <S%H3034><s%> and confess עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> behalf חַטֹּ֤אות <S%H2403><s%> the sins בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֣אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> which we have sinned לָ֔ךְ וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I וּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> against thee both I and my father's חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> have sinned

חֲבֹ֖ל <S%H2254><s%> We have dealt very חָבַ֣לְנוּ <S%H2254><s%> corruptly לָ֑ךְ וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמַ֣רְנוּ <S%H8104><s%> against thee and have not kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְוֹ֗ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <S%H2706><s%> nor the statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <S%H4941><s%> nor the judgments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֖יתָ <S%H6680><s%> which thou commandedst אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant

זְכָר־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> I beseech thee the word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּ֛יתָ <S%H6680><s%> that thou commandedst אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses עַבְדְּךָ֖ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּמְעָ֔לוּ <S%H4603><s%> [If] ye transgress אֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אָפִ֥יץ <S%H6327><s%> I will scatter you abroad אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> among the nations

וְשַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7725><s%> But [if] ye turn אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> unto me and keep מִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אִם־ <S%H518><s%> though יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become נִֽדַּחֲכֶ֜ם <S%H5080><s%> them though there were of you cast out בִּקְצֵ֤ה <S%H7097><s%> unto the uttermost part הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven מִשָּׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֲקַבְּצֵ֔ם <S%H6908><s%> [yet] will I gather [וַהֲבֹואֹתִים כ] (וַהֲבִֽיאֹותִים֙ <S%H935><s%> abide ק) אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> them unto the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I בָּחַ֔רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> that I have chosen לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> to set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> my name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> They עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> Now these [are] thy servants וְעַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> and thy people אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> whom פָּדִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> whom thou hast redeemed בְּכֹחֲךָ֣ <S%H3581><s%> power הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> by thy great וּבְיָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> hand הַחֲזָקָֽה׃ <S%H2389><s%> and by thy strong

אָנָּ֣א <S%H577><s%> I beseech אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> O Lord תְּהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> You אָזְנְךָֽ־ <S%H241><s%> thee let now thine ear קַ֠שֶּׁבֶת <S%H7183><s%> be attentive אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to תְּפִלַּ֨ת <S%H8605><s%> to the prayer עַבְדְּךָ֜ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servant וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to תְּפִלַּ֣ת <S%H8605><s%> and to the prayer עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of thy servants הַֽחֲפֵצִים֙ <S%H2655><s%> who desire לְיִרְאָ֣ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name וְהַצְלִֽיחָה־ <S%H6743><s%> and prosper נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee לְעַבְדְּךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> I pray thee thy servant הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day וּתְנֵ֣הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and grant לְרַחֲמִ֔ים <S%H7356><s%> him mercy לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> in the sight הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of this man הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַאֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become מַשְׁקֶ֖ה <S%H4945><s%> was the cupbearer לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> For I was the king's פ
